body.name: Hisense 40-Inch Class A4 Series FHD 1080p Google Smart TV (40A4K, 2023 Model) - DTS Virtual: X, Game & Sports Modes, Chromecast Built-in, Alexa Compatibility, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 3 hrs 49 mins
features: FHD RESOLUTION: Along with 1080p high-definition LCD screen, you’ll find a powerful full array LED backlight, creating a sharper, more colorful picture.
DTS VIRTUAL: X: This scalable and versatile advanced post processing package creates immersive audio by virtualizing height content over traditional stereos.
GAME MODE: Enjoy a better gaming experience. In Game Mode, input lag is significantly improved, so your commands from the controller are virtually instantaneous on the screen.

SPORTS MODE: With sports mode’s pre-set settings, the television automatically adjusts itself to optimize sports content. Motion is smoother and color is adjusted for the best sports experience the television is capable of.

VOICE REMOTE: With the voice remote, you can open apps, adjust the volume, and search for your favorite shows using your voice. Just press the Google Assistant button on your remote to talk to Google.
GOOGLE TV: Browse 700,000+ movies and TV episodes, plus live TV, from across your streaming services — in one place, and organized by the genres and topics that interest you the most.
CHROMECAST BUILT-IN: Go from your phone, tablet, or laptop to your TV in an instant. With Chromecast built-in, you can cast all your favorite movies, shows, apps, games, and more directly to your TV.
BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY: Wirelessly connect a compatible soundbar, headphones or stereo components to your TV. Then turn it up. Sounds like your favorite playlists sound better.
body.description: Experience your favorite entertainment with the Hisense A4 Series Google TV. Google TV seamlessly brings together your movies, shows, live TV, and subscriptions, and organizes them just for you. The voice remote provides easy access to the built-in Google Assistant, allowing you to explore a vast library of content. Additionally, the A4K includes DTS® Virtual: X™ technology to enhance your audio experience and immerse you further you’re your entertainment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent picture quality and smart features for this TV
reviews.reviewText: The Hisense 32-Inch Class A4 Series FHD 1080p Google Smart TV is a compact yet feature-packed television that delivers a solid viewing experience with some noteworthy smart capabilities.Crisp Full HD Resolution: The 1080p resolution ensures sharp and clear picture quality. Whether you're watching movies, streaming content, or gaming, you'll appreciate the vibrant visuals and fine details this TV offers. It enhances audio quality, creating a more immersive sound experience. The TV produces clear dialogue and an enveloping soundstage, making movies and games more enjoyable.Customized Viewing Modes: The Game and Sports modes are a real treat for enthusiasts. These modes optimize settings for gaming and sports content, enhancing your overall experience. The ability to tailor your viewing experience is a definite plus.Seamless Streaming with Chromecast Built-in: Chromecast integration simplifies streaming from your mobile devices. It's easy to cast your favorite content to the big screen, whether it's videos, music, or apps. This feature enhances the TV's versatility.Alexa Compatibility: If you're in the Amazon Alexa ecosystem, you'll appreciate the compatibility. This allows for convenient voice control and integration with other Alexa-enabled devices in your home.Compact and Stylish Design: The 32-inch size is perfect for smaller spaces or as a secondary TV. Its design is sleek and modern, complementing various room aesthetics.Decent Connectivity: This TV offers multiple HDMI and USB ports, ensuring you can connect your gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, or other peripherals without hassle.Great Value for the Size: If you're looking for a smaller TV that doesn't compromise on features, the Hisense 32A4K is a cost-effective option.In conclusion, the Hisense 32-Inch Class A4 Series FHD 1080p Google Smart TV is a solid choice for those seeking a smaller TV with excellent picture quality and smart features. The addition of DTS Virtual: X, viewing modes, and Chromecast built-in make it a well-rounded option for various entertainment needs.Definitely must try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Smart TV
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, on sale price, not heavy at all, one bad thing is the legs that came with TV is wobbly and cheaply made. Bought our own stand is worth it. Quality picture and easy to navigate TV remote. Happy with our new Smart TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NICE TV THAT FITS WELL IN A SMALLER ROOM
reviews.reviewText: I HAD THIS SHIPPED OVERSEAS TO CROATIA, THE LOCATION OF MY CURRENT JOB, AND WAS TICKLED WHEN THE BOX ARRRIVED IN GREAT SHAPE. NO DENTS OR DINGS WITH MY COMPLIMENTS TO THE POSTAL SERVICES INVOLVED. HAS A GREAT PICTURE AND WAS EASY TO SETUP TOO AND HAS ENOUGH PORTS TO CONNECT OTHER DEVICES TO IT.FOR HAVING SPENT SO LITTLE MONEY AND GETTING A NICE PRODUCT THIS WOULD BE A TV THAT I COULD BUY AGAIN AND AGAIN.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars screen bad out of box
reviews.reviewText: the bottom half of screen is either all line or foggy or both depending on what it decides to do also top right corner had a 2 inch black box that ran to center of screen and had varying number of vertical lines in it ......truly disappointing i have a hisense 40 inch NOT SMART tv that is over 10 years old maybe 15that still works which was why i went with hisense ........amazon did the right thing after UPS screwed up the pick up by not showing up and applied my refund to a different tv after several hours multiple times on the phone ..... would have been nice if amazone would have done the right thing on first phone call .... but better late than never ....... i fulfilled all my obligations for the return and it was not my fault UPS [whom amazon hired] failed to do their job [imo UPS and FEDEX drivers in my area are very poor at their job but amazon drivers do great job bringing product to door fedex never does and UPS does sometime fedex leaves next to road abd they disappear a lot] and after i explained this for the umpteenth time amazon did the right thing and credited refund to account so i could replace tv b4 sold out as it was over $100 off reg price and UPS missed friday pickup which made it at least a 4 day delay ...... i have decided not to buy from companies that use fedex many times due to the driver here not following fedex protocols and bringing package to door....i may have to pay a bit more on amazon occasionally but amazon drivers here do a great job delivering my stuff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent TV for the money
reviews.reviewText: For those of you having trouble pairing the remote with the TV there is obviously a small little problem with the instructions given to you. Do not press the two keys that they show on the screen they are incorrect. They actually want you to press the center home key and the back arrow, those are the ones you should press as depicted in my picture. other than that no other problems with the picture quality internet and TV everything's functioning as it should. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hi quality, wonderful color!
reviews.reviewText: We always buy Sony Bravia, but just needed a 40" for our work out room. I seen all the 5 star reviews and decided to jump on the wagon too. Great decision. We can't believe at this price range is of such high quality. I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent 40" TV for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Replaced an older 37 inch Vizio with fire TV. The fire TV tick was not responding to the remotes.The clarity is superior to the older Vizio. Setup was easy once I tossed the manual. It took awhile but after following the video setup on the screen it was a breeze. The only thing that disappointed me is the speakers. Might get a small sound bar to enhance the sound. Mounted it on our bedroom wall but had to run into town to get sorter bolts because the bolts from the mounting bolts for the heater Vizio were about a half inch to long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smart tv
reviews.reviewText: Got this TV for a fantastic price (last Year's uled model, smaller size fit my application needs). Great picture quality.Negative was busy set-up, slightly time/information requirement heavy.
